name: quiqqer/backendsearch
description: With the QUIQEQR Backend Search module you are able to search contents of the QUIQQER Backend (Administration). You can search sites, users, media content, settings etc. The Backend Search can be extended by other QUIQQER modules to allow searching for custom content.

dev:init:check-requirements: which composer > /dev/null || (echo 'Error: composer has to be globally installed'; exit 1)
which phive > /dev/null || (echo 'Error: PHIVE has to be globally installed'; exit 1)

scripts-descriptions.test: Runs linting, static analysis, and unit tests.
scripts-descriptions.dev:lint: Run PHPStan and code style check
scripts-descriptions.dev:lint:style:fix: Try to fix code style errors automatically
scripts-descriptions.dev:init: Initialize the developer tooling (tools and git hooks)
scripts-descriptions.dev:init:check-requirements: Check if the necessary requirements are met
scripts-descriptions.dev:init:git-hooks: Install all git hooks (may require tools to be installed)
